summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the manner of collecting assessments levied for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to the north city limits, providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of said Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Eightieth Street; under Ordinance No. 40216, and repealing Ordinance No. 41313.
